formElement.label: Script Location:
formElement.documentation: Absolute path of the stop server script, including filename and extension. i.e: "/path/to/stopManagedServer.cmd". (Required)

formElement.label: Instance Name:
formElement.documentation: Instance name of the Managed Server to stop. (Required)

formElement.label: Config Name:
formElement.documentation: Configuration name from which the URL is retrieved. (Required)
